participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, enjoys spending time with her pets and has a fondness for stability.
participant_1.background: i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my favorite color is grey. i'm terrified of scorpions. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Social and adventurous, loves cars and fitness, but struggles with commitment in relationships.
participant_2.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.

content.text: i would never do that   i hate my grey dog barnaby and scorpions
